messages.text:
*** Submitted as b50a7fb49394 ***

go.empty: prototype for new subrepository

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5572056

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
default

http://codereview.appspot.com/5572056/diff/2001/README
File README (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5572056/diff/2001/README#newcode14
README:14: use the usual hg change, mail, submit to send in the change.
will someone need to set up codereview beyond having the .cfg file?

On Tue, Jan 24, 2012 at 15:47,  <r@golang.org> wrote:
> will someone need to set up codereview beyond having the .cfg file?

It depends on whether the [extensions] entry is in
their $HOME/.hgrc or their per-repository $GOROOT/.hg/hgrc.
In the former case, no; in the latter case, yes
(the same lines copy over).

Russ
by the way, LGTM but someone more code-social should probably agree

subject: code review 5572056: go.empty: prototype for new subrepository
